CodeList.Name: Brief Pain Inventory Questionnaire Test Name

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: aching.
Brief Pain Inventory - On the diagram, put an X on the area that hurts the most.
Brief Pain Inventory - On the diagram, shade in the areas where you feel pain.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: biofeedback.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: burning.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: cold compresses.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Cold Compresses to Relieve Pain

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Concerned Use Too Much Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Concerned Use Too Much Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Are you concerned that you use too much pain medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Concerned with Too Much Pain Medication Use

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Which of the following best describes your current job status?
Brief Pain Inventory - Current occupation.
Brief Pain Inventory - I believe my pain is due to a medical condition unrelated to my primary disease. Please describe condition.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: distraction.
Brief Pain Inventory - Education.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: exhausting.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: gnawing.
Brief Pain Inventory - If you take pain medication, how many hours does it take before the pain returns?
Brief Pain Inventory - How long has it been since you first learned your diagnosis?
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: hypnosis.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Kind of Surgery in Past Month
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Kind of Surgery in Past Month
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - What kind of surgery have you had in the past month?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Kind of Surgery in Past Month

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Marital status.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Meds not Prescribed Taken for Pain
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Meds not Prescribed Taken for Pain
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Medications not prescribed by my doctor that I take for pain are.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Medications not Prescribed Taken for Pain

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: miserable.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: nagging.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Need Further Info about Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Need Further Info about Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Do you feel you need to receive further information about your pain medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Need Further Information about Pain Medication

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Need more Pain Med than Prescribed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Need more Pain Med than Prescribed
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Do you feel you need to take more of the pain medication than your doctor has prescribed?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Need more Pain Medication than Prescribed

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Need Stronger Type of Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Need Stronger Type of Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Do you feel you need a stronger type of pain medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Need Stronger Type of Pain Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: numb.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: other. Please specify.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Specified Other Method to Relieve Pain

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: other.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Other Methods to Relieve Pain

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Pain at its Least in Last Week
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Pain at its Least in Last Week
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its least in the last week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain at its Least in Last Week

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Pain at its Worst in Last Week
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Pain at its Worst in Last Week
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain at its worst in the last week.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain at its Worst in Last Week

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Pain Due to Effects of Treatment
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Pain Due to Effects of Treatment
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - I believe my pain is due to the effects of treatment.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Due to Effects of Treatment

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Have you ever had pain due to your present disease?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Due to Present Disease

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - I believe my pain is due to my primary disease.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Due to Primary Disease

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Pain Due to Unrelated Med Condition
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Pain Due to Unrelated Med Condition
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - I believe my pain is due to a medical condition unrelated to my primary disease.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Due to Unrelated Medical Condition

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your enjoyment of life.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Interfered with Enjoyment of Life

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your general activity.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Interfered with General Activity

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your walking ability.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Interfered with Walking Ability

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your mood.
Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your normal work.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Interfered with Normal Work

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your relations with other people.
Brief Pain Inventory - Circle the one number that describes how, during the past week, pain has interfered with your sleep.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Pain Medications in the Last 7 Days
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Pain Medications in the Last 7 Days
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Did you take pain medications in the last 7 days?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Medications in the Last 7 Days

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that best describes your pain on the average.
Brief Pain Inventory - When you first received your diagnosis, was pain one of your symptoms?
Brief Pain Inventory - Have you had pain other than these everyday kinds of pain during the last week?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Pain Other than Everyday Kinds

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - I feel I have some form of pain that requires medication each and every day.
Brief Pain Inventory - Please rate your pain by circling the one number that tells how much pain you have right now.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: penetrating.
Brief Pain Inventory - I prefer to take my pain medicine.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Prefer to Take Pain Medicine

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Problems with Side Effects Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Problems with Side Effects Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Are you having problems with side effects from your pain medication?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Problems with Side Effects Pain Medication

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Education. Professional degree.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: relaxation techniques.
Brief Pain Inventory - In the last week, how much relief have pain treatments or medications provided? Please circle the one percentage that most shows how much relief you have received.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: sharp.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: shooting.
Brief Pain Inventory - Spouse's occupation.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: stabbing.
Brief Pain Inventory - Have you had surgery in the past month?
Brief Pain Inventory - I take my pain medicine (in a 24 hour period).
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: tender.

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Things that Make Pain Feel Better
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Things that Make Pain Feel Better
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - What kinds of things make your pain feel better?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Things that Make Pain Feel Better

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Things that Make your Pain Worse
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Things that Make your Pain Worse
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - What kinds of things make your pain feel worse?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Things that Make your Pain Worse

EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: throbbing.
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: tiring.
Brief Pain Inventory - What treatments or medications are you receiving for your pain?
Brief Pain Inventory - Check Yes or No if the adjective applies to your pain: unbearable.
Brief Pain Inventory - Other methods I use to relieve pain include: warm compresses.
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Warm Compresses to Relieve Pain

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Which Side Effects from Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Which Side Effects from Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Are you having problems with side effects from your pain medication? Which side effects?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - What Side Effects from Pain Medication

EnumeratedItem.CodedValue: BPI1-Why Concerned Use Too Much Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCSynonym: BPI1-Why Concerned Use Too Much Pain Med
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:CDISCDefinition: Brief Pain Inventory - Are you concerned that you use too much pain medication? If Yes, why?
EnumeratedItem.nciodm:PreferredTerm: BPI - Why Concerned with Too Much Pain Medication Use
